text: Note that certain items called "banner" are in fact categorised as polestaves, which are not to be confused with polearms.
The unofficial worlds for Falador Party Room are worlds 301 (US East) (F2P), 302 (UK) (P2P).
For a similar types of weapons, see banner and polearm.
For a list of quest items, see /Need for quest, /Originating quest or /Achievement Diary.
This guide is the expansion of all subquests of Recipe for Disaster.
This section details a discontinued feature and is kept here for historical purposes.
